name: Ethernet Surfer
description:
[WIP] Unfortunately I started the game on the last day and my GMT was not compatible with the Game Jam local GMT (losing half of Sunday time). 

Even with that, I am not giving up and I will you try to bring something to life based on the Jam theme. Not for the Jam anymore, but for the entire community.

_____________________________________________________

LAST UPDATE: The latest version submitted (Build 2) had actual 8 hours since its concept to the development stage it current is. From those 8 hours, at least 5 of them were spent on the game design/development. 

_____________________________________________________

As Voy, you have to ensure that the Data Package will reach its destination. 

Avoid obstacles and protect your data from malicious creatures and thieves  in order to delivery the package.

This game is a mix between Subway Surfer with some Monster Rancher-like battles.
